Detailed Description

Encapsulates database access in easy to use objects.

GPLv2

Author:
Kevin Ross <r0ssar00@gmail.com> Copyright (C) 2009 Kevin Ross Allows really easy access to an sqlite database without having to worry about sqlite statements. Core class is the Database. You create Tables associated with a database to which you can add Columns and then Rows.

db_type_int  integer type
db_type_str  string type
db_type_intkey  primary key type

enum defer_types_t

the defer type enumeration

Enumerator:
defer_force  Force the call to defer until commit is called.
defer_none  Force the call to commit immediately.
